content.rendered:
Directed by H. Vinoth.

Written by H. Vinoth.

Cast Karthi(Theeran Thirumaran). Rakul Preet Singh(Priya Theeran). Abhimanyu Singh(Omveer (Oma)). Bose Venkat(Satya). Praveena(Theeran’s mother). Manobala(Priya’s Father). Sathyan(Theeran’s Friend). Sonia(Sathya’s Wife). R.N.R. Manohar(Minister). Kishore Kadam(Haram Singh). Mathew Varghese(IGP Vijay Rathore). Rohit Pathak(Banne Singh). Narra Srinivas(Madhur). Surender Thakur(Kaali). Prayas Mann(Bora). Jameel Khan(Pandit). Kalyani Natarajan(Priya’s Mother). Ammu Abhirami(Theeran’s Sister (as Abhirami)). Scarlett Mellish Wilson(Dancer) .Mozammel Hoshen Chowdhury.Fighter Karthi. Porkodi(Police Officer). Shahjahan Shamim(Stars). Vignesh Vijayan(Theeran Special team Officer)

Language Tamil.

Producers Aravendraj Bhaskaran. Pradeep Gaur. R. Kathiravan. S.R. Prabhu. S.R. Prakashbabu.

Production Dream Warrior Picture. Goldmines Telefilm.
